title: Create WiFi download speed optimization app

requirements.text: Create a backend actor that analyzes WiFi connection parameters and provides optimization recommendations to improve download speeds
acceptanceCriteria: Backend actor accepts WiFi connection data as input
System analyzes connection parameters and returns optimization suggestions

requirements.text: Build a frontend interface where users can input their current WiFi settings and view personalized optimization tips to increase download speeds
acceptanceCriteria: Users can enter WiFi connection details through a form
Interface shows before/after expected speed improvements

requirements.text: Implement a speed testing feature that measures current download speed and tracks improvements over time
acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate a download speed test
Test results are displayed in Mbps
Historical speed data is stored and viewable as a trend chart

requirements.text: Design a creative, modern visual theme for the app with a cohesive color scheme, typography, and layout that conveys speed and network connectivity. Use energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple unless specifically requested) and ensure consistent styling across all components
acceptanceCriteria: App has a distinct visual identity with consistent colors and fonts
Design elements reinforce the theme of speed and optimization
UI is visually cohesive across all pages and components

constraints: Must work within Internet Computer platform constraints
Cannot integrate with external WiFi APIs or device-level controls
Speed testing must be simulation-based or use available web-based methods
nonGoals: Direct modification of device WiFi settings

required: WiFi signal strength icon with radiating waves in a modern style (wifi-signal.dim_128x128.png)
Speed gauge or speedometer illustration showing fast download concept (speed-gauge.dim_256x256.png)
